content:
Hello,
i have noticed a change in the MedicationRequest from STU3 to R4 in the attribute "requester". In STU3 it was a BackboneElement and i could reference the actual doctor (practicioner) and his organization. Now i can only give one reference to either "Practitioner" or "Organization". What is the best way to mention both on my MedicationRequest?
PractitionerRole allows you to point to both.
Theodor Szymkowiak has marked this topic as resolved.
